snippet.title: Re:Turn - One Way Trip [Announce Trailer]
snippet.description:
Play Now! 
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1195360/ReTurn__One_Way_Trip/
Switch https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/re-turn-one-way-trip-switch/
Xbox https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/re-turn-one-way-trip/9nbv4j87rlsg?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
Playstation https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP3430-CUSA19233_00-0000000000RETURN

Discord - https://discord.com/invite/kgwb8fF
Twitter - https://twitter.com/re_turn_game
Green Man Gaming Publishing Twitter - https://twitter.com/gmg_publishing

Re:Turn - One Way Trip is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle-adventure horror game. Trapped in a ghostly train, Saki must search the past and present to find and save her friends. More importantly, Saki must use her wits if she is to survive against an unspeakable evil hellbent on avenging unrequited love.

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR CHANNEL: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbONsRevt2_YIN6sLigGIzQ?sub_confirmation=1

Green Man Gaming Publishing - publisher of fine independent PC games. Games such as Aporia: Beyond The Valley, Stormworks: Build and Rescue, Pride Run, Skybolt Zack, Aeronautica, and much more.
